messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The word "Penis" is now punishable by a punch in the stomach

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Big tiddy with several nipples, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, not more than 15 [REDACTED] have descended into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Medbay Treatment Center.
